oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Development of tools for automated physical weed control
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nørremark, Michael
Melander, Bo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tools are being developed for automated physical weed control in the close to crop area. The most promising weed control concepts are the so-called high precision tillage solutions and thermal weed control by pulsed lasers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Nørremark, Michael and Melander, Bo (2009) Development of tools for automated physical weed control. ICROF’s news, February 2009, pp. 2-3.
